concept.title: User Security
concept.shortdesc: UltiPro security is based on role definitions within your organization. Upon completion of role definitions, one or more roles can be assigned to each user.

conbody.p: Employee users are defined as those employees within a company who have access to the UltiPro portal. User access to employee information can be further restricted with the use of role qualifiers (for example, component company, region, or pay group). Qualifiers limit user access to specific roles. Qualifiers assigned to a role may restrict which employees the user can view or manage while working within that specific role.
